controller.title: Data controller
controller.p1: Personal data collected on the WellWithWaves website is processed under the responsibility of {companyName}, located at {address}.
controller.p2: For any question related to privacy and personal data, you can contact us at: {email}.

data.title: Data collected
data.p1: We collect only the information strictly necessary through the website forms (quote requests, contact), such as: name, professional email address, organisation/hospital, role, phone number and message content.
data.p2: Fields marked as required are necessary to process your request. Other information is optional.
data.p3: Please do not send sensitive or medical data through the forms.

purposes.title: Purposes
purposes.li1: Handling and replying to contact and quote requests.

lawful.title: Legal basis
lawful.p1: Processing is based on our legitimate interest to respond to requests and, where applicable, on pre-contractual measures when you request a quote.
lawful.p2: Where required, certain processing may also rely on your consent.

retention.title: Retention periods
retention.p1: Data from contact and quote forms is kept for up to 3 years from the last interaction.
retention.p2: Technical logs are kept for a limited period for security and troubleshooting purposes, in accordance with applicable obligations.
retention.p3: After these periods, data is deleted or anonymised.

security.title: Data security
security.p1: We implement appropriate technical and organisational measures to protect personal data against unauthorised access, alteration, disclosure or destruction.
security.p2: These measures may include encrypted connections (HTTPS), restricted access to data and secure hosting environments.

processors.title: Recipients & processors
processors.p1: Your personal data is intended for WellWithWaves only.
processors.p2: It may be processed by technical service providers (hosting, email delivery) acting as processors, solely to provide the service and under GDPR-compliant commitments.
processors.p3: Unless explicitly stated otherwise, we do not transfer your data outside the European Union.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.p1: Under the GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, erase, object to, restrict processing of, and port your personal data.
rights.p2: You can exercise your rights by contacting: {email}.
rights.p3: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with your supervisory authority (in France: the CNIL).

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.p1: We use only cookies that are strictly necessary for the website to function.
cookies.p2: We do not use advertising or commercial tracking cookies.
cookies.p3: If audience measurement tools are enabled, they are configured in compliance with regulations and, where applicable, subject to your consent.
